page.title: 12PETERHEAD ENGINEERING
page.content: Peterhead Engineering started off with about half a dozen men,a small truck, little equipment and a fishyard.The firm is jointly owned by 3 men _ Mr Bill Adams,Ferrari and a lawyer.The work they are engaged in is the oil industry,oil related repair work and fishing.The most important field of work is anything to do with oil related repair work.They repair oil rigs,oil lines and anything on oil rigs.There are 255 people employed at present.There are many different trades in the firm eg.mechanical engineers,boiler makers,welders, electricians,carpenters & technicians. There is a branch in Dundee & there was one in Aberdeen which has just closed down.The oil industry is very important to Peterhead.The firm is having computers built in.There is definitely scope for expansion.
